title: WatchGress
summary: WatchFace (Unofficial) based on the game Ingress for Android Wear watches.
developerAddress:
III Travesia, Nº 50
24390, Dehesas
León, España
description: Very customizable and with which you can look, items, badges, logos, anomalies... on the wrist of your hand, and display your name and agent level. It also has support display to cycles and checks, and deploy them to see the remaining time. Will be added and improved with more options.Support : · 6 Differents Faces (Items, Badges, Fields...) · 3 Styles (Res, Enl and Same Theme) · Differents backgrounds · Level and Agent Name · Watch Battery · Date with Day and Month · Time with 3 Hands · Digital time · Secondary face with more info · Visor of Cycles and Cheks Dates · Visor of Cycles and Cheks Timers · Much more to come....The watch face is optimized to preserve battery life watch. It has a ambient mode way with which you can see minute hour day and month in the simplest way and without spending resources unnecessarily.WEAR 1.5- : For devices with Android Wear 1.5 and lower you need to wait for the APP to be installed from the "Android Wear" app on the phone.WEAR 2.0+ : For devices with Android Wear 2.0 and above you need to install the APP from the Google Play of the Phone and from the Google Play of the Watch.NOTE : This APP isn't a common Android APP (It will not appear in the app drawer), it's a WatchFace and need the Google APP (Android Wear) for interact.PROBLEMS : If you have problems with the application, please contact the email from this page, and try to solve them!!
descriptionHTML:
Very customizable and with which you can look, items, badges, logos, anomalies... on the wrist of your hand, and display your name and agent level. It also has support display to cycles and checks, and deploy them to see the remaining time. Will be added and improved with more options.

Support :
· 6 Differents Faces (Items, Badges, Fields...)
· 3 Styles (Res, Enl and Same Theme)
· Differents backgrounds
· Level and Agent Name
· Watch Battery
· Date with Day and Month
· Time with 3 Hands
· Digital time
· Secondary face with more info
· Visor of Cycles and Cheks Dates
· Visor of Cycles and Cheks Timers
· Much more to come....

The watch face is optimized to preserve battery life watch. It has a ambient mode way with which you can see minute hour day and month in the simplest way and without spending resources unnecessarily.

WEAR 1.5- : For devices with Android Wear 1.5 and lower you need to wait for the APP to be installed from the "Android Wear" app on the phone.

WEAR 2.0+ : For devices with Android Wear 2.0 and above you need to install the APP from the Google Play of the Phone and from the Google Play of the Watch.

NOTE : This APP isn't a common Android APP (It will not appear in the app drawer), it's a WatchFace and need the Google APP (Android Wear) for interact.

PROBLEMS : If you have problems with the application, please contact the email from this page, and try to solve them!!
comments: UPDATE: Keeps getting better. The dev actually updates the watchface, adding more features and icons, really love the latest one ;) keep em coming! Could do with adding those new Wear 2.0 features like adding shortcuts to other apps etc.  Watch face didn't appear in list for Wear 2.0, had to go to Google Play on my watch  and actually install the app via the watch for it to appear. The dev was amazing at helping! 5 stars!
App doesn't install correctly on my phone would love to use it but didn't get a chance to
recentChanges: · Added New Badge (Acolyte 2017, Ada 2017, NL Prime 2017...)
· Added New Badge (EXO5 Controller, NL1331e 2017, Clear Field, Guardian Hunter)
